    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    Aircraft
    Abstract base class for all aircraft types.
    AircraftFactory
    Factory class responsible for creating aircraft instances.
    AircraftLoader
    Loads aircraft from scenario data and registers them to the WeatherTower.
    Balloon
    Concrete Aircraft implementation representing a Balloon.
    Coordinates
    Represents a Value Object to 3D position of an aircraft.
    Flyable
    Interface representing an observer/listener rule in the weather simulation.
    Helicopter
    Concrete Aircraft implementation representing a Helicopter.
    JetPlane
    Concrete Aircraft implementation representing a JetPlane.
    ScenarioReader
    Reads and parses the scenario file.
    ScenarioReader.Scenario
    Represents a simulation scenario.
    Simulator
    Entry point of the aircraft simulation.
    SimulatorRunner
    Runs the aircraft simulation for a specified number of cycles.
    Tower
    Abstract class representing a Subject in the Observer pattern.
    Weather
    Enumeration representing all possible weather conditions in the simulation.
    WeatherProvider
    Singleton class responsible for providing weather information based on coordinates.
    WeatherTower
    Concrete Subject that notifies aircraft about weather changes.
